quote: 'Oh come on man,' said Dave. 'That’s seriously not cool. You’re supposed to ride those, not use them as meat shields.'

Then five or six more residual traps fired off at greater intervals. And then nothing. 'Dude,' said Dave. 'What have you got against horses?' 'It had to be done.' 'And that,'said Tim, 'is how you disarm a room full of traps.'
Can the fairies sense I'm pissed off?
I mean, I guess you can throw the Wererat at him.
When in doubt, if something goes wrong, just... nudity. It usually works.
Sleep well with your bad decisions.
